author: jianyunt
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1670.
- [x] Code is [rebased][sync] on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation][docs].

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Please use present tense, imperative style for commit messages and title per [Contribution Guide](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7a8589a8c516c3048b4555415b9ac13a24b6d6ed/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission).  Updated title.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Please update the PR template with the issue this resolves.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Again, Please use the present tense, imperative style for commit messages per [Contribution Guide](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7a8589a8c516c3048b4555415b9ac13a24b6d6ed/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission).

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Please update the PR template with the issue this resolves.

title: Add Map Book for Experienced Bash users
